actionTemplate.title: Soft downturned liner for an innocent look
steps: Line only the outer half of the upper lash line
Extend the tail slightly down while lengthening outward
Keep the line light and not too thick
Fill lash gaps; stop before the inner corner
Clean the tail with a swab for a crisp shape

rationaleTemplate: Downturned tails soften the expression and look natural
Partial liner is easier for beginners and suits daily makeup
